cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.helper

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.ualberta.ca.medlog.helper.Encryption

  • public class Encryption
extends java.lang.Object

    Description:
    The purpose of this class is to allow for encryption of byte arrays based off the users provided username(key).

    Issues:
    None.

    References:
    https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7360403/base-64-encode-and-decode-example-code https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3451670/java-aes-and-using-my-own-key https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24910620/encode-and-decode-bitmap-to-byte-array-without-compress Accessed Nov 20, 2018

        public static java.lang.String encryptData(java.lang.String key,
                                           byte[] data)
                                    throws EncryptionException
        Encrypts the provided data using AES.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        data - The data to be encrypted as a byte array.
        Returns:
        The data as an encrypted string.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - Thrown if the encryption fails.

                          throws EncryptionException
        Decrypts the provided data using AES.
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        data - The data to decrypt as a string.
        Returns:
        The byte array of the data decrypted.
        Throws:
        EncryptionException - Thrown if the decryption fails.
